item.Q:
Write the character: shì
(biǎoshì de shì)
item.A:
to show; reveal
表示 biǎoshì to express; to show; to say; to state; to indicate

traditional: 不勝
bùshèng cannot bear or stand; be unequal to; very; extremely

traditional: 不可勝數
bùkěshèngshǔ countless; innumerable

traditional: 全勝
quánshèng total victory; to excel by far; name of a tank; slam

traditional: 勝任
shèngrèn qualified; competent (professionally); to be up to a task
shèngrén to carry out effectively

traditional: 勝似
shèngsì (v); be better than; surpass; be superior to

traditional: 勝利
shènglì victory

traditional: 勝利者
shènglìzhē victor; winner

traditional: 勝地
shèngdì well-known scenic spot

traditional: 勝於
shèngyú outrange

traditional: 取勝
qǔshèng score a victory

traditional: 名勝
míngshèng a place famous for its scenery or historical relics; scenic spot

traditional: 得勝
déshèng to triumph over an opponent

traditional: 戰勝
zhànshèng prevail; surmount

traditional: 百戰百勝
bǎizhànbǎishèng emerge victorious in every battle; be ever-victorious

traditional: 手推車
shǒutuīchē trolley

traditional: 推動

tuīxiǎng supposition
tuīlǐ reasoning; speculative; inference
tuīsuàn to calculate an amount; to extrapolate (in calculation)
tuīxíng to put into effect; to carry out

traditional: 推論
tuīlùn to infer; a deduction; a corollary; a reasoned conclusion

traditional: 推進

traditional: 推選

traditional: 類推
lèituī to reason by analogy
bǎocún to conserve; to preserve; to keep; save (a file)

traditional: 內存
nèicún memory; random access memory; RAM (computer); internal storage
gòngcún to coexist
cúnzài to exist; to be

cúnfàng to deposit; to leave in sb's care

xiàncún extant; living; coming down to the present; in stock; in store

liúcún to keep; to preserve; extant; to remain (from the past)

traditional: 長存
chángcún to exist forever
shànghuǒ to get angry

shìyì to hint; to indicate (an idea to sb)

shìyìtú drawing used to convey basic meaning; sketch; schema
